name: American College Football Recruits
options: Year of the desired recruiting class
Amount of recruits you want to get. Max 500
special_instructions: The 'recruitingClass' filter is required. It represents the year of the desired recruiting class.
The 'numCroots' filter is optional. It represents the amount of recruits you want to get with a maximum of 500.
The data can be downloaded in various formats such as HTML table, JSON, CSV, Excel, XML, and RSS feed.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
